title: Top media publishers in the U.S. 2017 , by online traffic
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Page views in millions for 20 number of Media Publishers.
Media Publisher msn.com has the highest Page views in millions and news.yahoo.com has the lowest Page views in millions.
There is a difference of 1625.2 between the maximum Media Publisher msn.com and minimum Media Publisher news.yahoo.com.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Media Publisher in the x axis and Page views in millions in the y axis.
The Page views in millions is highest at Media Publisher msn.com and lowest at Media Publisher news.yahoo.com.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Page views in millions for 20 number of Media Publishers.
Media Publisher msn.com has the highest Page views in millions and news.yahoo.com has the lowest Page views in millions.
There is a difference of 1625.2 between the maximum Media Publisher msn.com and minimum Media Publisher news.yahoo.com.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Page views in millions for 20 number of Media Publishers.
The maximum Page views in millions 1810.3 is found at Media Publisher msn.com and the minimum is found at news.yahoo.com where Media Publisher is 185.1.
The Page views in millions of Media Publisher msn.com is 9.78% larger than the minimum value at news.yahoo.com.
Page views in millions at Media Publisher msn.com is 1810.3 , second place is drudgereport.com at 1256.2, and thirdly is news.google.com at 1236.8.
The lowest value 185.1 at news.yahoo.com is almost 2.94 times smaller than the average value 616.25.
